meanings.sent1: She thought the idea of flying to the moon on a paper airplane was loony.
meanings.sent2: The man's loony behavior made his friends worry about his well-being.
meanings.sent3: The loony squirrel kept trying to climb the glass window, thinking it was a tree.
meanings.sent4: Her loony obsession with collecting rubber ducks was starting to concern her family.
meanings.sent5: The loony clown at the circus made everyone laugh with his silly antics.

meanings.definition: A crazy or mentally unstable person.
meanings.sent1: The movie portrayed the villain as a loony who wanted to take over the world.
meanings.sent2: The loony in the park was talking to invisible friends and laughing loudly.
meanings.sent3: The loony at the party kept insisting that the moon was made of cheese.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a loony trapped in a world where everyone else was normal.
meanings.sent5: The loony on the street corner was shouting about aliens coming to Earth.
